name: Take Care by OLEO
description: OLEO is a coffee company and Take Care is our first concept. OLEO is an independently owned, regionally focused roasting company founded out of necessity to create products and environments to fuel the working class. Our mission is to honor the labor of the farmer, the supply chain and the relationships necessary to sustain the trade. All of our offerings are sourced exclusively from single farm coffee producers through our network of exporters and importers around the globe.

name: Onyx Coffee Lab
description: Located in the heart of Downtown, this 3-story cafe is a welcome back for Onyx to the amazing town of Springdale. Visit our artisan chocolate production facility downstairs and enjoy amazing offerings being served up all day long on our state-of-the-art coffee bar

name: Onyx Coffee Lab
description: A favorite coffee spot for locals and travelers alike, this small shop is bustling and cozy and features beautiful coffees handcrafted by some of the world’s best baristas.

name: Onyx Tonics Specialty Coffee
description: Modern coffee tasting bar offering a weekly rotating menu of 6 or more single-origin coffees.

name: Onyx Coffee Lab
description: In our smallest footprint yet, the downtown Fayetteville location captures the same quality and hospitality that abounds in our other cafes and transplants it into a quick-service, grab-and-go format. Order inside, at the bar, or at the walk-up window for an expedited experience. Visitors waiting on their order of coffee, food, or treats can meander into the beautiful open spaces surrounding our bar where Northwest Arkansas Florist offer a sprawling assortment of plants, flowers, and handmade gifts worth marveling at.

name: Ampersand Coffee Roasters
description: We offer high-quality specialty coffee that is 100% organic and fair trade, and produced with the highest levels of environmental and social responsibility. Come check out our tasting room or buy premium coffee direct from our website!

name: Verb Coffee Roasters
description:
Verb is a specialty coffee roaster focused on offering a unique collection of single origin coffee. Available at our cafe or online. 

Arguably the best spot for Pour Over coffee in Boulder

name: Sawada Coffee
description: The first U.S. coffee shop of world renowned barista and latte art master Hiroshi Sawada. Those in the know line up outside the industrial style café, with a wall of windows facing Green Street. Guests can order from a curated menu of expertly crafted espresso and matcha-based drinks, including military lattes, cortados, and cappuccinos, paired with a selection of pastries and the legendary Doughnut Vault camouflage doughnut.
